definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: I hope to be available for the Coppa Italia match against Udinese. I remain confident.
sentences.chinese: 希望在意大利杯对阵乌迪内斯的比赛时我能复出吧。

sentences.english: Lots of spaghetti on a big big plate.
sentences.chinese: 很多意大利面在一个大盘子里。

sentences.english: Hundreds of specially trained dogs form Italy's corps of canine lifeguards.
sentences.chinese: 目前意大利共有数百只受过特训的救生犬。

sentences.english: This comes from a plague that was spreading in 590 A.
sentences.chinese: 这源于公元590年意大利的一场瘟疫。

sentences.english: The finish is long and supple. Creamy pasta dishes, quiches or with cheese.
sentences.chinese: 这款酒是奶油意大利面或奶酪的最佳搭配。

sentences.english: Later the Italian madrigal becomes the most distinguished genre.
sentences.chinese: 稍后，意大利牧歌成为最著名的作品。

sentences.english: Juan Guarda Tempranillo is excellent with meat, cheese and Italian dishes.
sentences.chinese: 最适合佐餐肉类，奶酪和意大利美食。

sentences.english: The picture was recorded from an Alpine mountain pass not far from Turin, Italy.
sentences.chinese: 这张照片是在离意大利都灵不远的一条山道上拍摄的。

sentences.english: Italy's metal-workers' union calls goes on strike.
sentences.chinese: 意大利钢铁工人联盟发起罢工。

sentences.english: Refugees from Messina were relocated to cities throughout Italy.
sentences.chinese: 墨西拿难民被重新安置在意大利境内其它城市。

sentences.english: I'll just make a nice risotto .
sentences.chinese: 我会做超好吃的意大利饭。

sentences.english: Or a to-do list the length of Italy?
sentences.chinese: 还是一份像意大利那么长的清单？

sentences.english: Among those whose conversations were monitored is Massimo De Santis, the ref Italy is sending to the World Cup this summer .
sentences.chinese: 其中包括德桑蒂斯，今年意大利选派到世界杯的裁判。

sentences.english: The same thought came to me while trying out the upscale Italian restaurant Casa Mosaico.
sentences.chinese: 来到卡萨马可意大利餐厅，心境仿佛又回到过去。

sentences.english: Genuine Italian woven cotton elastic provides stretchability for more comfort.
sentences.chinese: 真正的意大利棉梭织弹性提供更舒适的拉伸。

sentences.english: So the invasion from an enemy country irritated an Italian scientist.
sentences.chinese: 因此来自一个敌国的入侵激怒了一名意大利的科学家。

definition: Europe/abbr. for 歐羅巴洲|欧罗巴洲[Ou1 luo2 ba1 Zhou1]
